name: Tomas Lindberg
description:
'''Tomas Lindberg''' (born 16 October 1972), also known as "'''Tompa'''" and "'''Goatspell'''", is a Swedish vocalist who has fronted many [[death metal music|death metal]] bands, most notably [[At the Gates]]. He has been active as a musician and composer since the late 1980s. He also teaches [[social studies]].

Lindberg was ranked number 30 out of 50 of The Greatest Metal Frontmen of All Time by [[Roadrunner Records]].
